about_the_game: Mr Death is a Terrifying Thriller where you take place as a detective named Sebastian Moonshade in a town named Woodcarve. Your mission is to investigate the murders of the killer Vincent Crowfield whilst playing against his quick-witted AI that learns from your prior actions that will do anything to prevent you from stopping him with his plans.
